item.title: Secure Remote Home Server Access With mTLS and WireGuard
item.description: This article explains how to securely access your home server and its services with mTLS and WireGuard. It is part of my series on creating a home server on an old laptop. I’m assuming that you’ve set up Docker, Caddy, and Authelia, as described in the first article of the series.
